Package com.advertisementproject.campaignservice.service.interfaces

Interface CampaignService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CampaignServiceImpl
public interface CampaignService
Service for managing campaigns in the database with CRUD operations and enabling the controller endpoints to work.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Campaign createCampaign​(Company company, CampaignRequest campaignRequest)
    Creates a new campaign and saves to database
    void deleteAllCampaignsByCompanyId​(java.util.UUID companyId)
    Deletes all campaigns for a specific company id
    void deleteCampaignById​(java.util.UUID campaignId, java.util.UUID companyId)
    Deletes a specific campaign
    java.util.List<Campaign> getAllCampaigns()
    Retrieves all campaigns
    java.util.List<Campaign> getAllCampaignsByCompanyId​(java.util.UUID companyId)
    Retrieves all campaigns for a specific company id
    java.util.List<Campaign> getAllPublishedCampaigns()
    Retrieves all published campaigns
    Campaign getCampaignById​(java.util.UUID campaignId, java.util.UUID companyId)
    Retrieves a specific campaign
    java.lang.String getDiscountCode​(java.util.UUID campaignId)
    Retrieves the discount code for a specific campaign
    Campaign updateCampaignById​(java.util.UUID campaignId, java.util.UUID companyId, CampaignRequest campaignRequest)
    Updates a campaign in the database

  • Method Details

    • getAllCampaigns

      java.util.List<Campaign> getAllCampaigns()
      Retrieves all campaigns
      Returns:
      list of all campaigns

    • getAllPublishedCampaigns

      java.util.List<Campaign> getAllPublishedCampaigns()
      Retrieves all published campaigns
      Returns:
      list of all campaigns that are published

    • getAllCampaignsByCompanyId

      java.util.List<Campaign> getAllCampaignsByCompanyId​(java.util.UUID companyId)
      Retrieves all campaigns for a specific company id
      Parameters:
      companyId - the company id for which to retrieve campaigns
      Returns:
      list of all campaigns related to the supplied company id

    • deleteAllCampaignsByCompanyId

      void deleteAllCampaignsByCompanyId​(java.util.UUID companyId)
      Deletes all campaigns for a specific company id
      Parameters:
      companyId - the company id for which to delete campaigns

    • getCampaignById

      Campaign getCampaignById​(java.util.UUID campaignId, java.util.UUID companyId)
      Retrieves a specific campaign
      Parameters:
      campaignId - the id of the campaign to retrieve
      companyId - the company id for the campaign. Used to verify that the company client has ownership of the campaign in question
      Returns:
      the requested campaign

    • createCampaign

      Campaign createCampaign​(Company company, CampaignRequest campaignRequest)
      Creates a new campaign and saves to database
      Parameters:
      company - the company that the campaign belongs to
      campaignRequest - information from which to generate the new campaign
      Returns:
      the newly created campaign

    • updateCampaignById

      Campaign updateCampaignById​(java.util.UUID campaignId, java.util.UUID companyId, CampaignRequest campaignRequest)
      Updates a campaign in the database
      Parameters:
      campaignId - the id of the campaign to be updated
      companyId - the company id for the campaign. Used to verify that the company client has ownership of the campaign in question
      campaignRequest - information from which to update the campaign
      Returns:
      the newly updated campaign

    • deleteCampaignById

      void deleteCampaignById​(java.util.UUID campaignId, java.util.UUID companyId)
      Deletes a specific campaign
      Parameters:
      campaignId - the id of the campaign to delete
      companyId - the company id for the campaign. Used to verify that the company client has ownership of the campaign in question

    • getDiscountCode

      java.lang.String getDiscountCode​(java.util.UUID campaignId)
      Retrieves the discount code for a specific campaign
      Parameters:
      campaignId - the id of the campaign to get the discount code from
      Returns:
      the discount code from the campaign with the supplied campaign id
